description:
Cozy studio apartment on a quiet street with lovely stores, restaurants and bars nearby.  Easy access to the 4-5-6 subway line and crosstown bus, and a short walk to Metropolitan Museum of Art. The real NYC experience!

Wifi and cable access available to all guests.
name: Studio near Central Park East!
review: Oscar was very communicative and did everything possible to make our trip awesome. Our flight was 3 ours late and still he has been waiting for our arrival until past midnight to welcome us. Everything was the way it was portayed pefore. We highly recommend it
